v-model.description: 选中项，type类型为checkbox时，类型为 array；type为radio 时 ，类型为 number / boolean / string
v-model.description_zh: 选中项，type类型为checkbox时，类型为 array；type为radio 时 ，类型为 number / boolean / string

value-key.description: option object, the key corresponding to the value
value-key.description_zh: 选项对象中，value 对应的 key

label-key.description: In the options object, the key corresponding to the displayed text
label-key.description_zh: 选项对象中，展示的文本对应的 key

loading-color.description: Loaded colors can only be written in hexadecimal color values, and cannot use abbreviations
loading-color.description_zh: 加载的颜色，只能使用十六进制的色值写法，且不能使用缩写

display-format.description: Customize the formatting function of the display copy, which returns a string
display-format.description_zh: 自定义展示文案的格式化函数，返回一个字符串

label-width.description: Set the width of the header on the left

error.description: Whether it is in the error state, and the content on the right side is red when the error state is in the error state
error.description_zh: 是否为错误状态，错误状态时右侧内容为红色

align-right.description: The value of the selector is shown on the right

before-confirm.description: Before determining the checksum function, receive (value, resolve) parameters, and continue to execute the picker through resolve, resolve receives 1 boolean parameter
before-confirm.description_zh: 确定前校验函数，接收 (value, resolve) 参数，通过 resolve 继续执行 picker，resolve 接收 1 个 boolean 参数

select-size.description: Set the size of the option group inside the picker (single/checkbox)
select-size.description_zh: 设置 picker 内部的选项组尺寸大小 （单/复选框）

min.description: Minimum number of checks (only valid under checkbox type, type checkbox)
min.description_zh: 最小选中的数量（仅在复选框类型下生效，type类型为checkbox）

max.description: Maximum number of checks, 0 is an unlimited number, default is 0 (only valid under checkbox type, type is checkbox)
max.description_zh: 最大选中的数量，0 为无限数量，默认为 0（仅在复选框类型下生效，type类型为checkbox）

use-default-slot.description: Set this option when using the default slot
use-default-slot.description_zh: 使用默认插槽时设置该选项

use-label-slot.description: Set this option when using the label slot
use-label-slot.description_zh: 使用 label 插槽时设置该选项

close-on-click-modal.description: Click whether the mask is off

safe-area-inset-bottom.description: Whether the pop-up panel sets the bottom safety distance (iPhone X type models)
safe-area-inset-bottom.description_zh: 弹出面板是否设置底部安全距离（iphone X 类型的机型）

filterable.description: Searchable (currently only local search is supported)
filterable.description_zh: 可搜索（目前只支持本地搜索）

ellipsis.description: Whether or not it is out of hiding

scroll-into-view.description: Reopen whether to scroll to the selection
scroll-into-view.description_zh: 重新打开是否滚动到选中项

show-confirm.description: Whether to display the Confirm button (only for the radio type)
show-confirm.description_zh: 是否显示确认按钮（仅radio类型生效）

prop.description: The form field model field name, which is required if the form validation function is used
prop.description_zh: 表单域 model 字段名，在使用表单校验功能的情况下，该属性是必填的

rules.description: Form validation rules, which can be used in conjunction with the wd-form component
rules.description_zh: 表单验证规则，结合wd-form组件使用

events.name: confirm
events.params: event.detail = { value, selectedItems }, checkbox 类型时 value 和 selectedItems 为数组，radio 类型为非数组

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the picker option is changed
events.params: { value }, checkbox 类型时 value 为数组，radio 类型为非数组
events.description_zh: picker 内选项更改时触发

events.name: cancel
events.description: Triggered when the close button or masked is clicked
events.description_zh: 点击关闭按钮或者蒙层时触发

events.name: close
events.description: Triggered when the pop-up window is closed

events.name: open
events.description: Triggered when a pop-up window opens
